attributes.action: Don't invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty without a parliamentary vote.
attributes.background: Leaving the EU will affect legal change in the UK, and Parliament is the supreme legal authority. The referendum does not outweigh the mandate to govern MPs receive via the fair winning of a democratic election. We ask that article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty not be invoked without a parliamentary vote.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
